artist: Painter: After Adriaen van Ostade; Etcher: David Deuchar
description: two images mounted on one sheet: top image: mother, daughter and baby in a doorway; copy in reverse lower image: a smoker and a drinker in an interior; smoker seated, drinker standing; jug on floor; copy in reverse
dimension:
3 5/16 × 2 5/8 in. (8.41 × 6.67 cm) (image, sheet, upper image)
3 1/8 × 2 7/16 in. (7.94 × 6.19 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 13/16 × 9 7/16 in. (30 × 23.97 cm) (mount)
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

top image in plate in pencil: ostrade | on mount beside image in pencil B14 copy in reverse

lower image on tablet on wall in plate in black: Av Ostade | in pencil on mount beside image: B24a copy in reverse

At top of mount in pencil Van Ostade (copies)   Bryans
portfolio: From A Collection of Etchings after the Most Eminent Masters of the Dutch and Flemish Schools
title: Print
